text: wadrb 'ayuha alrasul lilnaas -wbkhast dhww alkibr minhum - sifat aldunya alty aghtrru biha fi bhjtha wasureat zwalha, fahi kama' 'anzalah allah min alsama' fakharaj bih alnbat b'idhnh, wasar mukhdrrana, wama hi 'iilaa mdt ysyrt hataa sar hdha alnbat yabsana mtksrana tnsfh alriyah 'iilaa kl jh. wakan allah ealaa kl shay' mqtdrana, ay: dha qudrat ezymt ealaa kl shy'
